mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lecture (lectureID, agency, target, method, category, title, teacher, StarDate, endDate, classDetail, url) value(SEQ_LECTURE.nextval, #{agency}, #{target}, #{method}, #{category}, #{title}, #{teacher}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{classDetail}, #{url})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rn FROM lecture WHERE rownum <= #{pageNum} * {amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
